data.name: Farpost 44
data.detailed_description:
Farpost 44 is an Action-Adventure that takes place in the '44-Universe'.

All communication with the remote Farpost 44 has been LOST!

Gameplay takes place over a 44-HOUR TIME LOOP

Play as Marine Sergeant Raymond Stokes as one of 3 Operatives deployed to Farpost 44 to conduct covert intelligence gathering.

Investigate the mystery of Farpost 44.... What happened and why did Farpost go dark?

• A story-driven action adventure with multiple endings
• Unlock different story pathways to fully discover Farpost 44
• Play as 3 unique Operators and have them perform tasks in combination with your actions
• Unlock gear, upgrade your Operators which in turn unlocks more of the story!
